Social Catering and Events
In 2015 Social Catering & Events was founded to become Tallahassee & the Greater Panhandle’s premier offsite catering and venue management company. We are proud to operate the banquet space at the Capital City Country Club. The scope of our catering ranges from intimate full course dinners to large reception style parties that celebrate your special occasion with excellent service. Club members receive 50% off published room rental pricing. For more information please submit a request below.
Let’s talk about your next event!
Book Event Online
